meanings.sent1: The deedless man preferred to relax rather than work.
meanings.sent2: The garden remained deedless, with no plants or flowers.
meanings.sent3: The deedless cat slept all day, ignoring the mice running around.
meanings.sent4: Her room felt deedless, devoid of any personal touches or decorations.
meanings.sent5: The deedless sky was empty of birds, making it eerily quiet.

meanings.definition: Without any notable accomplishments or achievements.
meanings.sent1: The deedless student rarely participated in class activities.
meanings.sent2: His resume looked deedless, lacking any impressive work experience.
meanings.sent3: The deedless cake failed to impress the guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: The deedless mountain stood in the distance, untouched by climbers.
meanings.sent5: Her speech was deedless, lacking any memorable quotes or insights.
